version_description:
• Added ml and L units to hydrate Goal settings
• Added ability to swipe back from detail screens
• Fixed minor bugs and crashes reported by some users - thank you!

Thanks for using HabitMinder! Our goal is to make the app better and better with each update. If you have any suggestions or would like to say hello, don’t hesitate and reach us from inside the app by tapping Contact Support.

• Added ml and L units to hydrate Goal settings
• Added ability to swipe back from detail screens
• Fixed minor bugs and crashes reported by some users - thank you!

Thanks for using HabitMinder! Our goal is to make the app better and better with each update. If you have any suggestions or would like to say hello, don’t hesitate and reach us from inside the app by tapping Contact Support.

• Added ml and L units to hydrate Goal settings
• Added ability to swipe back from detail screens
• Fixed minor bugs and crashes reported by some users - thank you!

Thanks for using HabitMinder! Our goal is to make the app better and better with each update. If you have any suggestions or would like to say hello, don’t hesitate and reach us from inside the app by tapping Contact Support.

• Added Dutch localization
• Fixed crash when creating Hydrate habit with ML

• Added Dutch localization
• Fixed crash when creating Hydrate habit with ML

• Added Dutch localization
• Fixed crash when creating Hydrate habit with ML

Fresh update with some new features, improvements and bug fixes listed below. We love to hear your feedback and comments, please send those in!! Thank you for using HabitMinder! Change your habits, change your life!

NEW FEATURES
• Dark Mode (aka Pure Black on iPhone X)
• Added History list on Habit detail screen, where you can delete entries if needed
• Icon Badge (see not completed habits in the app icon bubble)
• Added goal value in Tomorrow's view

OTHER IMPROVEMENTS & FIXES
• Exercise habit now allows to manually enter your workout times
• Stand habit now allows to manually enter values
• Changed goal value to minutes for yoga, swim, play sport, ride bike
• Fixed crash when entering custom goal count value to more than 1000
• Fixed crash preventing a session running in background from saving progress 
• When deleting a habit, you now have ability to keep or delete history statistics
• Changing your goal does not effect past statistics
• Updated color picker and added yellow option
• Added new toothbrush icon - remember to brush your teeth!

NEW LANGUAGES
• Added Japanese, French and Swedish language support

• Added Apple Watch complication app shortcut

Thank you for using HabitMinder! Today we bring you freshly baked new features :)
1) iPad support - HabitMinder is now Universal! Enjoy HabitMinder on your iPad too! 
2) iCloud synch (Unlimited In-App Purchase required) - synchronize your data across multiple devices 

We are currently working on new features and to the Statistics area that will include more insights, please stay tuned for more coming soon!
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our Customer Support from inside the app.
Change your habits, change your life!

Change your habits, change your life!

Today we bring you great new features and improvements!

• NEW PREMIUM FEATURES* •
1) Statistics - additionally to the Summary you will now be able to see 3 new stats
7 Day Trend: view week by week completion trends
Calendar: in a month view, see which days you rock and which days you.. don't..
Year by Month: global view of the year, visually see how your performing by month

2) Skip Habit - ability to skip a habit during the day, on the main screen simply swipe right on a habit to reveal the Skip button. Remember skip habits only if you need to! Skipped habits count as not completed in stats.

3) Privacy Lock - ability to lock the app after you close it to background, uses TouchID or FaceID

4) Add Note - jot notes for habits, from main screen tap on the more menu icon and Add Note

5) iCloud Synch - synch data across your devices

• NEW HABITS •
Flights Climbed (HealthKit compatible)
Burn Calories (HealthKit compatible)
Weigh In (HealthKit compatible)
Take Medicine

On top of the new features, we also squashed multiple bugs, making the app run faster and smoother. 
Apple Watch app was also improved for performance.

If you have any requests or issues with the app, please don't hesitate and contact our support from inside the app by tapping Contact Support in the Settings page. 

Change your habits, change your life!

*Premium purchase required

This beta release if focused purely on performance. You will notice improved speeds during the initial app open, iCloud sync and responsiveness in the Apple Watch app. We have also added ability to change your App Icon too! Enjoy the update and as usual, if you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach our support from inside the app. 

Thanks for using HabitMinder - Change your habits, change your life!

• Siri Shortcuts! Now you are able to complete, skip, add data or view your habits directly via Siri! Configure your Siri phrases in the Habit Settings page.
• Added support for the new iPhone, iPad Pro and Apple Watch Series 4 devices.
• Apple Watch Complications wizard - configure which habit data to show on your Apple Watch Complication.
• Added ability to edit pre-defined Quick Add buttons.
• Fixed Stand habit showing Idle data.

Siri Shortcuts requires iOS 12.

Thank you for using HabitMinder! We hope you enjoy the new features! If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to reach out to our support from inside the app. Change your habits, change your life!

• Added ability to edit pre-defined Quick Add buttons.
• Fixed Stand habit showing Idle data.

Change your habits, change your life!

• Fixed Apple Watch app not showing weekly habits
• Fixed issue when clearing statistics for a habit, the not done was still showing
• Main screen and statistics performance improvements
• Skipped records no longer considered in streaks calculation
• Improved speed of Export to CSV (notes will be included in the export)
• Weekly graph will mark day as not completed for weekly habit when week is near to end.

Please note: launching 2.3.3 update for the first time might take longer than expected due to performance enhancements. This task is done one time and future app launches will be as usual.

Thank you for using HabitMinder! If you have any questions or suggestions, please let us know!

Thanks for changing and creating good habits with us! Today we bring you some bug fixes listed below:
• Fixed CSV export crash on iPad
• Fixed unit conversions
• Fixed crash when adding weight comma decimal
• Fixed weight showing wrong units in Today Widget

Today's update includes small bug fixes and improvements:
• Fixed stats page cutting off bottom numbers when screen in Zoomed mode
• Fixed issue showing multiple reminders that a habit has been completed
• Fixed issue in Hydrate habit showing 99% while goal was met
• Summary stats will no longer consider skipped habits in calculation

If you have any questions or feedback, we would LOVE to hear it! Keep on tracking your habits to change your life!
